name: The Verlaines
description: '''The Verlaines''' are a New Zealand rock band from [[Dunedin]]. Formed in 1981 by Graeme Downes, Craig Easton, Anita Pillai, Phillip Higham and Greg Kerr, the band went through multiple line-ups. Formed at the beginning of [[Dunedin sound]], The Verlaines were a key figure in the early history of [[Flying Nun Records]].
